alert.note: Alert for Cedar; Clinton; Jackson; Scott (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 3:58PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Scott, western Clinton, southwestern Jackson and northeastern Cedar Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 357 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lost Nation, or 11 miles southwest of Maquoketa, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could break small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... DeWitt, Long Grove, Wheatland, Grand Mound, Lost Nation, Calamus, Donahue, Welton, Toronto, Lyons, Malone, Elwood, Walnut Grove Park, Clinton County Fairgrounds and Sherman Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
